casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
DAVIS. No. S234324. Supreme Court of California July 13, 2016.

**471The petition for review is granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition of a related issue in People v. DeHoyos, S228230 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is *666deferred pending further order of the court. **472CANTIL-SAKAUYE, C.J., WERDEGAR, CHIN, CORRIGAN, LIU, CUÉLLAR, and KRUGER, JJ., concur.
